title: Available 2 Bed 2 Bath
posting_body: These apartments feature a living room, dining room, and a kitchen with standard appliances, standard countertops, a dishwasher, and disposal.
There is bamboo or concrete flooring in the living area and the kitchen, carpet in the bedroom(s), with tile in the bathroom(s).
Features central A/C, central heat, ceiling fans, include digital thermostats, high ceilings, and lighting fixtures.
Select units have wheelchair access and patio/balcony.
Full-sized washer/dryer in select units or washer/dryer connections.

Community amenities include business center, controlled access, interior courtyard, elevator access, fitness center, green build, common area WiFi, poolside lounge, courtesy patrol, on-site maintenance and management, package receiving, pool, valet waste and recycling, rooftop sundeck, bike storage, dry cleaning, electric vehicle charging, pet washing station, and BBQ grills.
Garage parking included in rent and additional garage parking for additional monthly fee.
PHOTOS ARE AN EXAMPLE OF SIMILAR UNITS WITHIN THE BUILDING, ACTUAL UNIT MAY VARY.
***Availability and pricing is real-time, can change daily, and varies by lease term***
